name: The Robber
description:
Steal as many items as you can and drop them into the extraction point;

But be careful, you can carry only one item at a time!

Avoid getting spotted by civilians, as they will call the police as soon as they see you!
Officers will chase you once they spot you, and since they're not stupid, they'll still come after you if you hide in front of them (maybe hide after going around a corner, who knows)

If you need to escape, interact with the window in the garage and flee the house!

CONTROLS:
WASD/arrow keys - move
E - grab/drop objects; interact
SPACE - toggle camouflage (only if you're carrying an object)
